name: Aloha Chicken & Veggie Kebabs
description: Fast, easy, and loaded with sweet-and-savoury pineapple teriyaki flavour! While made with just a handful of basic ingredients, these grilled chicken skewers are showstoppers! No grill? Broil pieces on a Sheet Pan.
preparation: Cut chicken into 1" cubes. Place in bowl; add dry glaze and oil. Stir evenly to coat. If you have extra time, let stand for 10 min to marinate.
Meanwhile, cut peppers and onion into 2" pieces.
Thread meat, vegetables, and pineapple onto skewers.
Place skewers on grill; rotate often until lightly charred and chicken is cooked through, 10â€“12 min.
perfectlyBalanceYourPlate: Serve with 1 pita, 1 cup fresh veggies, and 1 tbsp prepared Epicure dip.

products.name: Teriyaki Dry Glaze
summary: A versatile blend with notes of garlic, ginger, and soy that works both as a glaze for grilling or a sauce!

products.name: Grill Boss Skewers (Set of 6)
summary: Start grilling up praise-worthy meals this season with these made-to-last reusable skewers!
